name: 彭馨儀
objective: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
schedule:
Week 1	9/14	Chapter 1: pp. 1-13

Week 2	9/21	 Chapter 1: pp. 14-27
Week 3	9/28	 中秋節放假
Week 4	10/5	 Chapter 2: pp. 28-40
Week 5	10/12	 Chapter 2: pp. 41-50
Week 6	10/19	 Chapter 3: pp. 51-61
Week 7	10/26	 Chapter 3: pp. 62-69
Week 8	11/2	 Chapter 4: pp. 70-83
Week 9	11/9	 Chapter 4: pp. 84-96
Week 10	11/16	  Chapter 5: pp. 97-107
		    期中作業Deadline
Week 11	11/23	   Chapter 5: pp. 108-116
Week 12	11/30	   Chapter 6: pp. 117-127
Week 13	12/7	   Chapter 6: pp. 128-142
Week 14	12/14	   Chapter 7: pp. 143-157
Week 15	12/21	   Chapter 7: pp. 158-169
Week 16	12/28	   Chapter 8: pp. 170-185
Week 17	1/4	   Chapter 8: pp. 186-200
Week 18	1/11	期末考試
materials: Mary K. Ruetten, Developing Composition Skills:  Rhetoric and Grammar (2nd ed; Thomson Learning, 2001)
